Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the cost and value it brings, I am offering it to you for $120. I trust this price reflects the true worth of the product and the benefits it will bring to you. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
